# Investigate Feature: $ARGUMENTS

**⚠️ MUST READ** `.claude/skills/feature-investigation/SKILL.md` — Single source of truth for investigation workflow, phases, output format, and guidelines.

Investigate and explain how an existing feature or logic works. This is a **READ-ONLY exploration** — no code changes.

## Variables

- **FEATURE**: $ARGUMENTS (the feature/logic to investigate)

Follow the complete workflow defined in the SKILL.md above.
